entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 12:01 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 12:01 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
